attributes.action: Support farmers,pay rural farm payments on time.
attributes.additional_details: Payment on time: farmers are the salt of the earth:why do we have to suffer, the worry of not being able to pay our debts,last minute decision to inform us: no information as to when payments will be made.Try to get any answers is impossible:
attributes.background: This badly organised system has caused suicide within the farming community,disrupting cash flow.
